typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		date_format_date as date,
		date_format_int as integer,
		date_format_yyyy_mm_dd as string,
		date_format_dd_mm as string,
		day_suffix as string,
		day_name as string,
		day_name_short as string,
		day_num_of_week_format_d as integer,
		day_num_of_month_format_dd as string,
		day_num_of_year_format_ddd as string,
		day_is_week_end_y_n as string,
		week_num_of_year_format_w00 as string,
		week_num_of_year_format_yyyy_ww00 as string,
		week_num_of_year_format_yyyy__ww00 as string,
		iso_week_num_of_year_format_w00 as string,
		iso_week_num_of_year_format_yyyy_ww00 as string,
		iso_week_num_of_year_format_yyyy__ww00 as string,
		ops_week_num_of_year_format_w00 as string,
		ops_week_num_of_year_format_yyyy_ww00 as string,
		ops_week_num_of_year_format_yyyy__ww00 as string,
		first_day_of_week_format_date as date,
		last_day_of_week_format_date as date,
		week_num_of_month_format_w as byte,
		month_num_format_mm as string,
		month_num_format_yyyy_mm as string,
		month_name as string,
		ops_month_num_format_mm as string,
		ops_month_num_format_yyyy_mm as string,
		ops_month_name as string,
		TheMonthShortName as string,
		first_day_of_month_format_date as date,
		last_day_of_month_format_date as date,
		first_day_of_next_month_format_date as date,
		last_day_of_next_month_format_date as date,
		quarter_num_format_Q0 as string,
		first_day_of_quarter_format_date as date,
		last_day_of_quarter_format_date as date,
		year_format_yyyy as integer,
		iso_year_format_yyyy as integer,
		ops_year_format_yyyy as integer,
		first_day_of_year_format_date as date,
		last_day_of_year_format_date as date,
		year_is_leap_year_y_n as string,
		year_has_53_weeks_y_n as string,
		iso_year_has_53_weeks_y_n as string,
		ops_year_has_53_weeks_y_n as string,
		id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> glbDmClient
